The lockheed all-around aircraft? Was designed to probably do anything they can think of. Recon, assault, air strike. Not exactly an aviation expert so that's all I know. Also, still under development.

I'm more knowledgeable on small team tactics and a bit of small arms since that's what they taught me. Now, I must rest. Been singing, drinking and other stuff. and a bit drunk.

topics.body:
TIME FOR A HIP HOP STORY:

This story is about hip hop legend and survivor MF Grimm.

!http://api.ning.com/files/r0e5yM7iLi0qBtM2V6OauRsNZqH3zMbrF03naPjGN99aqOef*L53Zzykh-ayzmDuXajGuZMm9gZfnZkZ0pg5zixI4*zW2H1w/MFGrimmamd_percycarey.jpg!

MF Grimm has had a bad past, he was shot by a rival drug dealer 7 times and in the shooting, his half brother and manager Jay was killed, so most records labels cut contracts with Grimm after that, he entered a long Coma in which he managed to recover full vision, hearing, and speech ability, but was still forced to use a wheelchair.

One day in 2000 he was charged with posesion of narcotics and attempted conspiracy, he was sentenced to life imprisonment, Grimm paid a $100,000 bail for 1 last day (24 hours) free.

Trough this last 24 hours he quickly got to the studio, called all his rapper friends and together recorder what is considered one of the biggest underground rap album classics

!http://lh4.ggpht.com/_W5Y4NWr96ms/SXokUavA8fI/AAAAAAAAG3U/nIvr6sjLId0/mfgrimmibliys.jpg!

The Downfall of Ibliys: A Ghetto Opera.

After going to jail he spended his time studying law, then he proceeded to defend himself and managed to reduce his sentence to 5 years.

topics.body:
"@Too_Offensive":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54515912636872148d020100#post_54515912636872148d020100
Well let's look at the facts here.
[spoiler]Alraune is a flower demon. Madama takes the form of a butterfly. Now that being said, what do butterflies do to flowers? They polinate them  as well as feed off the necter in them. So I get the feeling there was some _"pollinating"_ that happened  between them. Whether it was consensual or otherwise I'll leave up to your imagination.[/spoiler]
And I just wrote a shipfic plot for Madama Butterfly and Alraune...
